v.1.8
▩ sport TV Live App now includes more than 60 sport channels
▩ Improved App Design with awesome features and improved functionality
▩ New features in "More" section
▩ Thanks for your feedback. If you like it, please write a positive Review in AppStore

v.1.5
▩ sport TV Live App now includes more than 60 sport channels
▩ Improved App Design, added new features & channel logos

▩ Improved functionality for AppleTV!
